item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, December 12, 2024 at 11:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. A ChatGPT clone, in 3000 bytes of C, backed by GPT-2 (2023) (221 points | 71 comments)
2. Parkinson's Law: It’s real, so use it (33 points | 28 comments)
3. Timemap.org – Interactive Map of History (46 points | 9 comments)
4. Certain names make ChatGPT grind to a halt, and we know why (129 points | 65 comments)
5. FCC opens entire 6 GHz band to low power device operations (590 points | 214 comments)
6. Run Database in GitHub Actions, Persisting Data to S3, and Access It Publicly (39 points | 29 comments)
7. Gemini 2.0: our new AI model for the agentic era (798 points | 405 comments)
8. Mysterious New Jersey drone sightings prompt call for 'state of emergency' (318 points | 503 comments)
9. Ham Radio All-in-One-Cable (127 points | 22 comments)
10. The Cold Email Handbook (233 points | 115 comments)
11. QEMU with VirtIO GPU Vulkan Support (192 points | 38 comments)
12. Review of Mullvad VPN (353 points | 122 comments)
13. PeerTube mobile app: discover videos while caring for your attention (383 points | 134 comments)
14. 12,419 days of Strandbeest evolution [video] (18 points | 1 comment)
15. The Marvelous Disappearing Capacitor (21 points | 1 comment)
16. OnlyFans models are using AI impersonators to keep up with their DMs (261 points | 342 comments)
17. Tricking c64 basic into clearing a hi-res screen quickly (41 points | 9 comments)
18. Startup will brick $800 emotional support robot for kids without refunds (17 points | 7 comments)
19. Pgroll – Zero-downtime, reversible, schema changes for PostgreSQL (new website) (222 points | 41 comments)
20. The GPU is not always faster (158 points | 81 comments)
21. Launch HN: Azalea Robotics (YC S24) – Baggage-handling robots for airports (107 points | 62 comments)
22. Dear OAuth Providers (258 points | 68 comments)
23. Deciphering C++ compiler errors: Nonsensical errors from a function declaration (25 points | 13 comments)
24. Evolving my ergonomic setup (or, my laptop with extra steps) (145 points | 78 comments)
25. Instant macOS install on Proxmox including AMD patches (136 points | 43 comments)
26. The Myth of Bananaland (136 points | 96 comments)
27. 2400 phone providers may be shut down by the FCC for failing to stop robocalls (342 points | 217 comments)
28. Dioxus 0.6 – Crossplatform apps with Rust (236 points | 92 comments)
29. RISC-V HiFive Premier P550 Development Boards with Ubuntu Now Available (149 points | 75 comments)
30. Geometry clipmaps: simple terrain rendering with level of detail (2017) (14 points | discuss)
